subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Two horses died and a jockey was injured in two races yesterday in Cheltenham, England.Ruby Walsh dislocated his shoulder in a heavy fall on Willyanwoody in the Club 16-24 Novices Chase. Willyanwoody died within minutes of the fall. Granit Jack was near the front of field in the Paddy Power Gold Cup when he fell two fences from home and died at the scene.Cheltenham is regarded as the top course for jump racing, but the meets are marred by equine fatalities. Two thoroughbreds died at the Cheltenham Festival in March, and nine died at the same meet in 2006.
